messages.content: [NAME] stopped napping at 18 months. We’ve been implementing quiet time since. It’s wondrous.
Your smartly worded refutation of the whole of the rest of Christendom has swayed me completely, Rome is the only true home! Hurrah! Hurrah!
[NAME] has been attacking the basket a lot this game,good to see.
But we did get an awesome transit line from downtown to the airport, plus most of the Olympic facilities existed before the games.
I pulled over at a Walmart on my way home from work to chat with all you beautiful faggots while I listen to the speech.
I thought V had great gameplay, but the big character switch that no one asked for really held it back.
Best thing about making moonshine is the ether vapors you get to collect :)
She was 100% more likable on the tell-all than she was in the show. She may deserve that sweet husband of hers yet!
One thing I appreciate about the Prequel trilogy is that it explores the rise of fascism better than *Fantastic Beasts* movies could do.
It’s always nice to say something [nice]!
GO SUB TO HIM HES THE BEST
Arguing the semantics of the word argument. Clever girl...
